column5: Does anyone know if you can fuel the new ram 1500 eco diesel with ultra low sulphur diesel? thanks.
Arnt all diesel fuel pumps have ultra low sulphur diesel?  That's all I put in my duramax  diesel
Does anyone know if you can fuel the new ram 1500 eco diesel with ultra low sulphur diesel? thanks.  That's the only thing available at the pumps    We haven't had LSD here in years.
LSD you say? yeah back in the day when diesel was 29 cents and LSD was 3 for 5....ahhhhh memory lane
